oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge certificate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge certificate for Sgt. John Wesley McDonough, 12th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA He enrolled in the army in Feb. 1863 in Nashville and was discharged in July 1865. The sergeant was born in Alabama but lived in Pinewood, Hickman Co. He was 29 years old, 5-foot-3, with light complexion and blue eyes. The discharge was given at Louisville, Ky. McDonough was the owner's great grandfather.
